def find_missing_number(A, N):
    total_sum = N * (N + 1) / 2
    current_sum = sum(A)
    missing_number = total_sum - current_sum
    return missing_number

    total_sum = N * (N + 1) * 2

    missing_number = total_sum - current_sum
    return missing_number
